rev.desc.rev.desc: update folder structure
improve log
merge from ContentPack APM
update panel "dump.patchrelversioninfo", change SQL to type="Patch"
start panel, change log file from "patchrel.log" to "detail.log"
Support 9.21 Application Patch 1
Support 711 Application Patch 2
support 711 Patch 1, refact
No longer dumping the language records
Panel start
Rebound $INTO.PATH references to the parameter
Panel start
Added #ext.access to the queries for RAD applications
Removed the queries pertaining to sm.upgrade because this is being moved to the preupg.bin unload application (apm.upgrade.build.other)
Changes to accomodate automated upgrade build
Changes to accomodate automated upgrade of the upgrade build
Added processing to support the addition of RAD=sm.upgrade and format=sm.upgrade.options to preupg.bin.
Added processing to support the addition of dbdictHelper and tableFunctions ScriptLibrary records to preupg.bin.
Deleted panel dump.sql.3 (this was referencing the deleted sqlwords table).
Added sqlmapping table dbdict to the unload.
Added processing to write the single upgverbld record to the transfer bin file. See SCR32590 for panels modified/created.
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 31220 Task 28699.
Change was made to also extract the RAD application build.list for the application upgrade.
To effect this change, Lines 4, 5, 6 and 7 of the start panel were changed to include build.list in the sql statement being built in those lines.
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 24065 Task 25567.
Change was made to also extract the RAD application remove.duplicates for the application upgrade.
To effect this change, Lines 4, 5, 6 and 7 of the start panel were changed to include remove.duplicates in the sql statement being built in those lines.
Follow-up modification for DEVTX BUB14529.

There was a coding error in panel transfer.wfwenvironment (the Option parameter was being passed $L.log, and the Log File parameter was NOT being passed anything...this was changed so that the Option parameter is passed "append", and the Log File parameter is passed $L.log).
Modification made for DEVTX BUG14529.
Application modified to also extract the following records for the upgrade:
1) systext records identified by section="config".
2) all wfwenvironment records.
Details of change:

1) Added two lines to the start panel to initialize the query variable for extracting the "config" records from systext ($L.systext.QryVar), and the query variable for extracting all records from wfwenvironment ($L.wfwenvironment.QryVar).
2) Added panel transfer.systext (which us a call to apm.upgrade.write.file) to do the actual extraction of the systext records.
3) Added panel transfer.wfwenvironment (which is a call to apm.upgrade.write.file) to do the actual extraction of the wfwenvironment records.
Modification for DEVTX BUG11497 and BUG12039.
Application modified to also extract the RAD application upg.regen.ir.
Another modification made for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287
Change was made to also extract the RAD application macro.build.field.array for the application upgrade.
See the MSWord document named Tsk22900Rqs24287 for details of what was done.
Modification made for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287
Change was made to also extract the RAD application us.gen.datadict for the application upgrade.
See the MSWord document named Tsk22900Rqs24287 for details of what was done.
